title: Lowe’s Stock Will Rise Because the Turnaround Is Working, Analyst Says
text:
Lowe’s stock (ticker: LOW) is edging up on a down day for the market, following an upgrade from Wedbush. The firm says the home improvement retailer’s turnaround is well under way.

The back story. Lowe’s has climbed a market-beating 22.7% year to date, although that still puts the shares behind Home Depot’s (HD) 36% climb. Plenty of investors are enthusiastic about Lowe’s ability to transform into a stronger company, thanks to new leadership and strategic changes. While trade war worries remain, insiders have been buying...
description: Lowe’s stock should climb further, Wedbush says. The firm argues the home improvement retailer’s turnaround is well under way, and it looks good in comparison to Home Depot.
